channel.title: [VB] Scriptable Autoclicker / Typer
channel.description:
In a nutshell:
Features:
- Built in autotyper, hotkey to start & stop - Fully scriptable, you can multiclick and auto-type just as you want. - Power, up to 1000 clicks / second - Start & Stop clicking with hotkey - Get mouse cordinates with hotkey - Modify hotkeys - Hide / Show when clicking - Choose clicking type - Program will remember your settings - Simplicity, easy to use - Yet, it's free! :)
If someone happens to have use for it, you can get it from [url=http://t-soft.sosblog.com]http://t-soft.sosblog.com[/url]
[img]http://i35.tinypic.com/307rw21.png[/img]

item.title: [VB] Scriptable Autoclicker / Typer
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Anima Dark Anima
item.description:
@Dark_Anima wrote:

The autotyper function simply uses VBs Sendkeys.Send(message) method.
What comes to the clicker, it uses win32 api, yes.

item.title: [VB] Scriptable Autoclicker / Typer
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Anima Dark Anima
item.description:
@Dark_Anima wrote:

In a nutshell:

Features:

  • Built in autotyper, hotkey to start & stop
  • Fully scriptable, you can multiclick and auto-type just as you want.
  • Power, up to 1000 clicks / second
  • Start & Stop clicking with hotkey
  • Get mouse cordinates with hotkey
  • Modify hotkeys
  • Hide / Show when clicking
  • Choose clicking type
  • Program will remember your settings
  • Simplicity, easy to use
  • Yet, it’s free!

If someone happens to have use for it, you can get it from http://t-soft.sosblog.com
